title: Morning Routine on Zen Dairy Goats Farm

subtasks: Waking up and greeting the cows
Leading the cow to the milking area
Preparing supplies (warm water, washcloth, dry rag)
Massaging the cow's udder to stimulate milk letdown
Catching the milk in a container
Checking the quantity of milk produced
Leading the sheep to the wash area
Using a washcloth to wipe the sheep
Drying the sheep with a towel

tasks.task: General morning routine for a dairy farm
subtasks: Communicating with the audience throughout the process
